title: Herb + Crystal Bundles — Ella Flora Weddings and Floral Design
description: Herb Crystal Bundles available for pickup in store or delivery to the greater Toledo and Bowling Green, OH areas.
sitename: Ella Flora Weddings and Floral Design
cleaned_text: Herb + Crystal Bundles Herb + Crystal Bundles Gorgeous dried florals with crystals. Perfect little gift! Info below. Herb + Crystal Bundles; order and be surprised by variety! These bundles are wrapped with hand-dyed ombre silk ribbon and are great for their cleansing and healing properties and keeping energies grounded and clear. Delivery and pick-up options available. Local hand-delivery to Toledo/Greater Toledo is $8 and Bowling Green is $12 per order. Our team delivers M-F when possible. USPS shipping is available for non-fresh floral items outside this region for $15 per order. (If your order total on non-floral items is over $75, please use code FREESHIP at checkout for FREE USPS shipping!) Pick-up is free at our store in Rossford at 301 Superior during business hours (currently 10-5 Wednesdays and 12-5 Thursdays and Fridays. Extended hours during holidays.)
